name: Cinematic Orb in a River under Accidental Pixels
description: I discovered a glitch in Blender where I can turn the sky into pixels which change according to where the sun is hitting various objects. This creates an interesting combination with my dreamscapes. This orb is made of cinema and rests on top of a turbulent river of information. The orb only need to rest upon the river to know its essence. The river does not have time to get to know the orb. It might not even know it is there.
